info.name: Goal APIs - Self-Actualization
info.description: Complete collection of Goal Management APIs including needs by category

request.description:
Get list of needs for a specific category. Use this to populate the dropdown when user selects a category for goal creation.

**Available Categories:**
- Survival
- Safety
- Social
- Self
- Meta-Needs

body.raw:
{
    "title": "Improve Sleep",
    "description": "Get 8 hours of quality sleep every night",
    "startDate": "2025-01-15T00:00:00Z",
    "endDate": "2025-02-15T00:00:00Z",
    "type": "Survival",
    "needKey": "sleep",
    "questionId": "507f1f77bcf86cd799439017"
}

request.description:
Create a new goal. If needKey is provided, title will be auto-filled as 'Improve {needLabel}'. If questionId is provided, it will be validated against the category and needKey.

**Required Fields:**
- title (or needKey for auto-fill)
- startDate
- endDate
- type (Survival, Safety, Social, Self, Meta-Needs)

**Optional Fields:**
- description
- needKey (links goal to specific need)
- needLabel (auto-filled from needKey)
- needOrder (auto-filled from needKey)
- questionId (can be provided directly or auto-filled from needKey)

response.name: Success Response

body.raw:
{
    "title": "Improve Sleep",
    "description": "Get 8 hours of quality sleep every night",
    "startDate": "2025-01-15T00:00:00Z",
    "endDate": "2025-02-15T00:00:00Z",
    "type": "Survival",
    "needKey": "sleep",
    "questionId": "507f1f77bcf86cd799439017"
}

response.body:
{
    "success": true,
    "message": "Goal created successfully",
    "data": {
        "_id": "507f1f77bcf86cd799439018",
        "userId": "507f1f77bcf86cd799439010",
        "title": "Improve Sleep",
        "description": "Get 8 hours of quality sleep every night",
        "startDate": "2025-01-15T00:00:00.000Z",
        "endDate": "2025-02-15T00:00:00.000Z",
        "type": "Survival",
        "needKey": "sleep",
        "needLabel": "Sleep",
        "needOrder": 7,
        "questionId": "507f1f77bcf86cd799439017",
        "isCompleted": false,
        "createdAt": "2025-01-15T10:00:00.000Z",
        "updatedAt": "2025-01-15T10:00:00.000Z"
    }
}

request.description: Create goal without providing title - it will be auto-filled as 'Improve Sleep' from the needKey. needLabel, needOrder, and questionId will also be auto-filled.
Get all goals for the authenticated user. Optionally filter by status (active or completed).

request.description: Get a specific goal by its ID. Returns goal with needKey, needLabel, needOrder, and questionId.

response.name: Success Response
response.body:
{
    "success": true,
    "data": {
        "_id": "507f1f77bcf86cd799439018",
        "userId": "507f1f77bcf86cd799439010",

request.description: Update a goal. All fields are optional. When isCompleted changes to true, achievements are automatically recalculated.

response.name: Success Response
response.body:
{
    "success": true,
    "message": "Goal updated successfully",
    "data": {
        "_id": "507f1f77bcf86cd799439018",
        "userId": "507f1f77bcf86cd799439010",
        "title": "Improve Sleep Quality",
        "description": "Get 8-9 hours of quality sleep every night",
        "startDate": "2025-01-15T00:00:00.000Z",
        "endDate": "2025-02-15T00:00:00.000Z",
        "type": "Survival",
        "needKey": "sleep",
        "needLabel": "Sleep",
        "needOrder": 7,
        "questionId": "507f1f77bcf86cd799439017",
        "isCompleted": false,
        "createdAt": "2025-01-15T10:00:00.000Z",
        "updatedAt": "2025-01-15T11:00:00.000Z"
    }
}

request.description: Mark a goal as completed. This automatically triggers achievement recalculation in the background. If user completes 3rd goal, coaching offer is automatically set to eligible.
Update the need associated with a goal. If needKey is updated, needLabel, needOrder, and questionId are auto-filled. If questionId is provided, it will be validated against the needKey.
